page.title: 01PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: In our village there are four churches.Two are Norman churches in origin.We have our own fire station manned by volunteers.Near by is a sewage works,a football field,a duckpond and an old well called St. Cuthberts and the Jubilee walk.There are three primary schools one of which is a church school.There is a library and near it is the Red House,where social functions can be held.Our school has a swimming pool which is open to the public in the summer. Our village has four pubs.Of particular interest is the Shrewsbury Arms,an early Tudor building.We have a garden centre called Roses and Shrubs. Recently it has been extended to include first a pottery store and now a cafe.
